title: Litany Of The Saints Conclusion for Episcopal Ordination
content:
THE CONCLUDING PRAYER
TO THE
LITANY TO THE SAINTS
FOR AN
EPISCOPAL ORDINATION.
Lord, be moved by our prayers.
Anoint Your servant with the
fullness of priestly grace,
and bless him with spiritual
power in all its richness.
We ask this through Christ our Lord.
Amen.
Bishop Albert LeGatt
Diocese of Saskatoon
Episcopal Ordination: Oct. 5, 2001
